0.Pros: McDonalds helps you with setting yourself up to begin your life. It helps you with understanding the important things like teamwork, dedication, and get it done mindset.
0.Cons: Higher ups tend to over exaggerate their titles, and take advantage of your hard work and loyalty, per say. Favors become necessary tasks just to finish your day. Plus, sometime unfair, and don't want to here your side of the story, saying it's an "excuse", because they always want to be right.

1.Summary: "Salty sweat, Burger blood and tasteful tears"
1.Pros: Food and working with people about the same age. A fast and good way to meet new friends if you handle stress.
1.Cons: Stressful and sometimes your co-workers are meatheads.

3.Pros: Advancement happens fast. Some Flexibility. Depending on management, you can have a great time doing good work.
3.Cons: Again, depending on management you can have a bad time killing yourself to be told to do better. Sometimes they'll promote the people who are just good friends with managers instead of hard workers.

4.Pros: Guaranteed hours, free lunch, and some good co-workers
4.Cons: Being yelled at for no reason, very manipulative upper management, and lazy employees

5.Pros: 1 Free Meal as Supervisor, No other real pros honestly.
5.Cons: Too Many Hours, Late Nights, No schedule changing, too much work with not enough time

7.Pros: It a easy job to work at and you balance your life with it .
